title: Dolic Bath Mat Bathroom Rugs Rubber Non-Slip Thin Mat Absorbent Quick Dry Bath Rug for Bathroom Floor Bathmat Shower Rug for Outside Bathtub Shower Room (Dark Grey 40 x 60 cm)
features: Super Absorbent & Stain-Resistant Bathroom Rug: Designed with a soft nappa leather surface and rubber backing, this mat instantly absorbs dripping water without leaving watermarks or stains. It keeps your bathroom floor clean, dry, and safe, offering a refreshing experience. Say goodbye to dampness! This super absorbent bath mat is perfect for use in front of the bathtub, shower door, or sink.

Non-Slip Backing & Low Profile – No Risk of Tripping: Our bath rugs feature a high-quality natural rubber backing that tightly grips smooth surfaces without skidding or curling up. This provides excellent anti-slip properties, even on wet floors, reducing the risk of slipping for kids and the elderly.

Easy to Clean: Unlike plush bath mats, these bathroom mats dry quickly and have a smooth surface that prevents dirt and hair from sticking. Cleaning is a breeze—simply wipe the mat with a damp cloth or rinse it with a shower nozzle to keep it fresh and hygienic. This saves time and energy, especially for busy individuals.

Durable & Long-Lasting: Made without microfibers, this bath mat eliminates concerns about fiber shedding or fuzzy pilling. The waterproof rubber backing prevents water from seeping underneath and spreading. Even when wet for prolonged periods, the rubber bath mat remains odor-free.

Multiple Size Choices: The super absorbent bath mat comes in three sizes: Small: 30x50cm – Perfect for small spaces, such as under a single sink or outside a single shower. Medium: 40x60cm – Ideal for medium-sized bathrooms. Large: 44.5x71cm – Great for larger areas, such as under double sinks, bathtubs, or big shower rooms. Choose the right size based on the space and layout of your bathroom before purchasing.
